# Edge QA

> Independent analysis, evaluation, and simulation testing for voice AI agents.
> Businesses using our platform detect user frustration early, align their voice AI better, and ultimately avoid losing customers.

Our platform helps you evaluate and improve conversational AI quality without vendor bias. We detect issues like latency, TTR, user frustration, noise sensitivity, and conversation drift â€” and offer actionable insights to fix them.

## Docs

- [Overview](https://ambersah.dev/edge/index.html): Homepage with features and information.
- [Contact](https://ambersah.dev/edge/contact.html): Contact page to get access to the product.
